```{r}

n<- length(palette_anime$digi_frontier)

  image(1:n, 1,
        as.matrix(1:n),
        col = palette_anime$digi_frontier,
        axes=FALSE)
  
  rect(0, 0.9, n + 1, 1.1, col = rgb(1, 1, 1, 0.8), border = NA)
  text(median(1:n), 1,
       labels = paste0(attr(palette_anime$digi_frontier,"name"),", n=",n),
       cex = 3, family = "sans")
```
